bmd-sync.Settings.Title: Journal Sync settings
bmd-sync.MarkdownSourcePath.Name: Markdown Source Path
bmd-sync.MarkdownSourcePath.Hint: The path to the markdown files under the Foundry Data folder, it is 'journal-sync' by default
bmd-sync.ImportWorldPath.Name: [Advanced] Import World Path
bmd-sync.ImportWorldPath.Hint: The world path relative to the Markdown Source Path to import from. Defaults to game name.
bmd-sync.ExportWorldPath.Name: [Advanced] Export World Path
bmd-sync.ExportWorldPath.Hint: The world path relative to the Markdown Source Path to export to. Defaults to game name.
bmd-sync.JournalEditorLink.Name: Journal Editor Link
bmd-sync.JournalEditorLink.Hint: Link to the editor you use to update the Journal Markdown. For example a hosted VSCode instance
bmd-sync.EnableTracing.Name: Enable Tracing
bmd-sync.EnableTracing.Hint: Increases the logging to the browser console for debugging
bmd-sync.SkipJournalFolders.Name: Skip Journal Folder Import/Export
bmd-sync.SkipJournalFolders.Hint: List folders you do not want to import/export. Comma delimited.
bmd-sync.SkipJournalEntries.Name: Skip Journal Entry Import/Export
bmd-sync.SkipJournalEntries.Hint: List Journal entries you do not want to import/export. Comma delimited.
bmd-sync.ShowButtonTop.Name: Show Button on Top
bmd-sync.ShowButtonTop.Hint: Unchecking this will put the launch button on the Journal sidebar bottom instead of top under the Search box
